channel.title: Santa-X
channel.description:
[CENTER] [B]Forums: [URL=http://"http://santa-x.org/community"]http://santa-x.org/community[/URL][/B] [B]Client Download:[URL=http://"http://uppit.com/qlj5lvxg63e4/Santa-X.jar"]http://uppit.com/qlj5lvxg63e4/Santa-X.jar[/URL] [/B][/CENTER]
[B][U]So you're probably thinking, why choose Santa-X?[/U][/B] [B][SIZE=2]Well, unlike other server's we dedicate our time and our hardest efforts to making the game enjoyable for you, this ranges from the Community that you play in to the Content on the game, we will always put in our hardest effort to make sure you're having fun on our game, not only that this isn't just [U]OUR[/U] game, it's your game too, we take your suggestions to the game very serious and if they're good, we'll try and implement it, you are the sole to our game.[/SIZE][/B]
[B][U]What else does Santa-X offer?[/U][/B] [B][SIZE=2]Not only our we dedicated and hard working, we also aim to build Santa-X to one of the best Runescape Private Server's known, this means that when we get donations they will be used for the Game, meaning that we will make sure we have the best Virtual Private Server deal we can get to ensure optimal performance, we will buy things for the server that we cannot implement ourselves, things like these are what we have to offer, we strive to make the game as fun as we can for you.[/SIZE][/B]
[CENTER][B][U]Santa-X's Features:[/U][/B] [B]VPS with DDoS Protection Great Stability Lag Free Lots of Bosses Many Minigames Custom Quests Active Staff Reliable Uptime Many Skills PVP Quest Cape requiring all Quests to be done Completionist capes etc Great Economy Fullscreen Client with settings
[B]These are only a small selection of our features.[/B] [/B][/CENTER]
[spoiler=Media!] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EYTNIBG.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5B97rlu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CjomRs1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LTXIur8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/a0pd2ol.png[/img] [/spoiler]

item.title: Santa-X
item.dc:creator: @craigshotter08 craigshotter08
item.description:
@craigshotter08 wrote:

Here’s some information from our old Advertisement thread keep in mind we’ve improved the game a lot.

[center]Santa-X[/center]
From the original developer of the famous well known santa-x server we bring to you the next big thing. This project was set up by two friends Zus suz and Matiasmunk who decided to develop a server based on the thought and opinion of the community. We have created a unique source that includes a flawless combat system along with dicing, fully functional grand exchange, duel arenas and all skills. The server is currently in beta mode and will be soon released withing the next few weeks or days.

You can visit the community at
www.santa-x.org

[center]Features
634 Animations & Gfx
525 maps and objects
634 items

    - Clipped player following, attacks, NPC's and projectiles

    - All client hovers working

    - Stable source

    - 634 Gfx and animations

    - Many re written classes

    - 8+ bosses to battle

    - Minigames re wrote

    - Flawless combat system

    - Packed with content

    - Repackaged server and client

    - Working enchanted items such as ring of life, recoil and phoneix necklace etc

    - 9 different user ranks with crowns + new commands system

    - Tweaked Combat

    - Changed Mapmarker

    - Changed Original Skull PK icon & interface icon

    - Bug free fullscreen/resizeable - webclient compatible

    - Transforming Rock crabs/NPCs and high detail maps

    - Quick prayers/curses saved on logout

    - XP counter (Saves, formatted etc)

    - Changed Client Icon

    - Added new Head ranks system above players!

    - Fixed RS2loginProtocol, with it fixed a dupe also got fixed: a lot of mandatory login flags were not taken into consideration.
     For example, and you can test this yourself, try and log into an account that is already logged in.
     The server won't reject the procedure like it should.

     I've taken the time to restructure the class

    - Added new Interface for Head-Ranks handling, choosing ranks to show

    - Added 7 new head ranks (Gfx,Vet,EXtreme don,Dev,Mod,Headmod,Owner

    - Added new Stat reset interface

    - Added stat resetter in Achievemnt tab, under Config

    - Added working buttons to stat resetter

    - Added 100% Switching, switching should work flawless

    - Re-Wrote Tormented Demons

    - Re-Wrote Corporeal Beast

    - Re-wrote Jad Minigame... Now working 100%

    - Added new Donator zone

    - 100% clan chat - Also includes lootshare/coinshare with loot potential & saving

    - Added Donator panel

    - Added NPC transforming to the donator panel

    - Re-wrote whole barrows class 100% working

    - Re-wrote whole Pest control class, working 100%

    - Fixed stackables & noted items for free

    - Flawless 525 maps with 32k+ object interaction

    - All skills working and advance

    - Custom login screen - Choose between animated or the non animated client backgrounds

    - Animated login screen with changer

    - Fully working Rs cursor system added

    - Patched alot of dupes

    - Added RSA

    - Added player shadows

    - Added smileys (emoticons)

    - Fixed alot of T2s

    - New icons for spell book teleports

    - Cleaned up Proccess void ()

    - Cleaned up some messy code

    - Enhanced Client performance, but still using too much MEM

    - Enchanced stability of the Server

    - Fixed bug minimap icons such as trees etc, was loaded 2 times, wich caused a conflict, making none of them show

    - Fixed Pink floors/maps at Duel arena

    - Added new texture for water, darkish, HD feeling

    - Added a info tab instead of a quest tab

    - Added " Name, level, rank, all points, kills, deaths" in info tab

    - Added "Players in wildy" into the info tab

    - Added a config tab with Reset stats & headicons

    - Quest system added

    - Fully working hitmarks and criticals

    - Working nex armour effects

    - Added more detailed textures/floors

    - Replaced "Report abuse" button with "Screenshot" Saves in cache/Screenshots

    - Fixed black tiles bug, in edge etc

    - Updated Head Ranks, added Removing the ranks

    - Started GrandExchange

    - Added when withdrawing, offering, can write Eg. 10M or 5k instead of 10.000.000, 5.000

    - Patched five dupes in GrandExchange

    - Full GrandExchange[/center]

Pictures


Fully Functional Grand Exchange


Fully Functional Emoticon


Flawless Clan Chat System

Read full topic

[B][U]So you’re probably thinking, why choose Santa-X?[/U][/B]
[B][SIZE=2]Well, unlike other server’s we dedicate our time and our hardest efforts to making the game enjoyable for you, this ranges from the Community that you play in to the Content on the game, we will always put in our hardest effort to make sure you’re having fun on our game, not only that this isn’t just [U]OUR[/U] game, it’s your game too, we take your suggestions to the game very serious and if they’re good, we’ll try and implement it, you are the sole to our game.[/SIZE][/B]

[B][U]What else does Santa-X offer?[/U][/B]
[B][SIZE=2]Not only our we dedicated and hard working, we also aim to build Santa-X to one of the best Runescape Private Server’s known, this means that when we get donations they will be used for the Game, meaning that we will make sure we have the best Virtual Private Server deal we can get to ensure optimal performance, we will buy things for the server that we cannot implement ourselves, things like these are what we have to offer, we strive to make the game as fun as we can for you.[/SIZE][/B]

[CENTER][B][U]Santa-X’s Features:[/U][/B]

Great Stability

Quest Cape requiring all Quests to be done
